html:
Is this a wraith or a ghost
No, it’s just a shadowt
Casted from the toilet to hallt
You see it with an edge of your eyet
Smell of unknown origint
Wont be that strikingt
Toilet next door
Becomes clean out of the suddent
Screaming on the hallwayt
Because the floor is wett
You think it’s a wraith againt
Again you blame unholy forcest
And it is like that every dayt
Your bed is never in ordert
Step away from the computert
Cause the floor needs to be clean
title: The floor
